content.raw:
This bug is related to #103 and builds upon the current solution/workaround of either disabling brake torques for the front wheels or enabling gas torques for the front wheels:

When going off the gas pedal the vehicle keeps driving at constant speed without deaccelerating. When using the default model that has front brake torques enabled (and as a result can't be steered properly due to the bug in #103), the vehicle deaccelerates but that's due to the bug of brake torques being applied on all wheels at all times without actively braking.
